mapper.select: select p.`id`,p.`produc_num`,p.`produc_code`,p.`produc_name`,p.`mfrsid`,p.`brandid`,p.`factory`,p.`produc_factory`,p.`produc_factorycolor`, p.`produc_color`,p.`unitid`,p.`batchid`,p.`size`,p.`technology_id`,p.`materialid`,p.`color`,p.`style_id`,p.`year`,p.`tax`,p.`tax_price`, p.`trade_price`,p.`transfer_price`,p.`retail_price`, m.mfrsname,b.brandname,u.unitname from aa_produca p left join c_mfrs m on p.mfrsid=m.mfrsid left join c_brand b on p.brandid=b.brandid left join c_unit u on p.unitid= u.unitid where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_produca where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select m.mfrsid,m.mfrsname from c_mfrs m left join cc_mg mg on m.mfrsid=mg.mfrsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=1
select b.brandid,b.brandname from c_brand b left join cc_mg mg on b.goodsid = mg.goodsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=1 and b.mfrsid = #{mfrsid} group by b.brandid;
